Peters, G.P., Minx, J.C., Weber, C.L., and O. Edenhofer (2011), Growth in emission transfers via international trade from 1990 to 2008. Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences (PNAS), 108(21), 8903-8908, Available at: Peters et al., 2011.

The use of data is conditional on citing the original data sources.

Data for years 2021 and 2022 are preliminary.
